meanings.definition: Using money and other resources carefully and not wastefully.
meanings.sent1: She is the thriftiest person I know, always saving her money for a rainy day.
meanings.sent2: The thriftiest shoppers always look for the best deals before making a purchase.
meanings.sent3: Even in a game of pretend shopping, she remained the thriftiest, never overspending her play money.
meanings.sent4: Her thriftiest habits shone brightly during the holiday season, as she found thoughtful gifts at affordable prices.
meanings.sent5: The thriftiest approach to budgeting is to track every penny spent to avoid unnecessary expenses.

meanings.definition: Characterized by economy and good management of money and resources.
meanings.sent1: The thriftiest households prioritize saving and investing for the future.
meanings.sent2: In a world of excess, she stood out for her thriftiest ways of living.
meanings.sent3: His thriftiest nature led him to create a budget spreadsheet that impressed his friends.
meanings.sent4: The thriftiest decision she made was to repair her old car instead of buying a new one.
meanings.sent5: The thriftiest businesses thrive by cutting unnecessary costs without compromising quality.
